text:
Hi,

I have successfully issued some paid credentials, however, for one party, I get `PACKAGE_SELECTION_FAILED(9,9a345b4b): No synchronizers satisfy the draft transaction topology requirements` .

Looking deeper in the logs, I see this:
`Phase 1: Pass 1 of topology-aware package selection command processing failed synchronizer routing: RoutingFailed(Generic(global-domain::1220b1431ef2...,Some packages are not known to all informees on synchronizer global-domain::1220b1431ef2...\nParticipant [third party participant id]... has not vetted da2af36b42e3...))`

What should I tell this third party client to do, so that it will work? Can you 'vet' an already uploaded package?

.
